title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected on the first attempt in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected.
EB: However, when attempting to select the same item for a second time, it gets selected successfully.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
4. Note that the label item fails to get selected on the first attempt.
5. Now, attempt to select the label item again, and observe that it gets selected successfully.
